page.title: 16THE SECONDARY SCHOOL,CLOWNE
page.content: THE SCHOOL OPENED IN 1942 AS A SENIOR GIRLS SCHOOL.ELEVEN YEARS LATER THE FIRST BOYS ATTENDED THE SCHOOL.IN 1977 IT BECAME A COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL FOR THE 11-18 RANGE. IT SERVES PEOPLE FROM AN AREA COVERING CLOWNE,WHITWELL,HODTHORPE AND BARLBOROUGH.ADDITIONALLY IT PROVIDES A 6th FORM FOR THE VILLAGE OF CRESWELL WHICH HAS ITS OWN 11-16 COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL. IN THE LAST TEN YEARS THE SCHOOL HAS BEEN EXTENSIVELY EXTENDED TO COPE WITH THE INCREASED INTAKE. DURING THE ACADEMIC YEAR 1984-5 THERE WERE 1,050 PUPILS ON ROLE OF WHOM 65 WERE IN THE SIXTH FORM.THE SCHOOL BEING AN 8 FORM ENTRY THIS YEAR.THE OPPURTUNITY EXISTS FOR PEOPLE WHO HAVE LEFT SCHOOL TO ATTEND LESSONS ALONG WITH PUPILS TO GAIN ACADEMIC QUALIFICATIONS.
